input.sentences: my friends came over my house for a halloween party this year .
my best friend and i were little devils .
my co-worker made his special chicken man appearance .
the cakes and pies took me a long time to make | but everyone enjoyed them .
the bat cookies were a crowd favorite .
output.sentences: Welcome to the halloween house party.
Our friends over there are a couple of devils
Thats my co-worker that looks like a special chicken.
Now its time to enjoy some pies.
I saved the cookies for my favorite crowd.
